venues.name: The Piedmont Club
venues.address: 361 E Main St B, Spartanburg, SC 29302
venues.arrival: Park at The Piedmont Club and walk 1 minute to the church for the ceremony; we'll walk back after the ceremony. Dinner is buffet-style at The Piedmont Club.

venues.name: First Presbyterian Church â€” The Chapel
venues.arrival: The ceremony is at First Presbyterian Church, The Chapel. Please arrive 15-20 minutes early.

airports.name: Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport
airports.notes: Primary airport. Approx 30 minutes from downtown Spartanburg.

airports.name: Charlotte Douglas International Airport
airports.notes: Approx 1.5 hours away; rental car recommended.
